entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: improve getExactClasses to support classes as base types #88547
  • Integrating .NET 8 WebAssembly project into the Angular app #88545

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add IEnumerable<T>.ToReadOnlyList() and ToReadOnlyCollection() extension methods #88018
  • Full GC starts every 24 hours after system starting #88035
  • Missing CI test coverage for Vector512 #88233
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move startup validation to the options assembly #88546
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Convert RuntimeHelpers intrinsics to JIT ones #88543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Improve `crossgen2 --help` layout #88544
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono][RISC-V] emit mul inst instead of emulated mul #85445
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Have jitstress_isas_x86_evex set PreferredVectorBitWidth=512 #88531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [RISC-V, LOONGARCH64] Fix FuncEvalHijack stack allocation #88493
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [interp] Add MINT_STELEM_VT_NOREF #87161
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2217148 #88506
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #87993
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Poolable / Resettable CBOR Readers #88104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: experimental changes to redundant branch opts #88527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add public MethodInvoker and ConstructorInvoker classes #88415
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fixes #82871 Add an additional constructor for StackTrace #88542
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #88530
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Ensure that NI_Vector_Dot is always handled as TYP_SIMD #88447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] source-build: don't skip building Native Aot artifacts. #88520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • RemoveDirectoryRecursive: fix delete of mount points #86918
    area-System.IO, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refactor `CheckFeatureAvailability` to not accept a `Location` parameter #68935
  • Consider caching `SyntaxNode.Location` #68934
  • Update `ConstructedNamedTypeSymbol` to use OneOrMany instead of ImmutableArray for type arguments #68933

Closed

  • Optimize+ doesn't seem to fully discard all unreachable code #68929
  • Code cleanup on save while resolving merge conflicts #60818
    17.6 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations of Location instances #68936
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Report nullable safety warnings (vs. "W"-warnings) for assignments to captured primary constructor parameters. #68931
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Merged

  • Update analyzers to 23356.2 #68916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Gracefully handle exceptions from DiagnosticSuppressor.SupportedSuppressions in IDE #68894
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • EnC analyzer refactoring: Abstract member bodies #68910
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68928
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE, untriaged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2217081 #49267
    area-mvc
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ListView.SelectedItem retains its value after item is removed from ListView or ListView is cleared #16053
  • Set up an Azure Devops image with maui pre-installed, as this would reduce CI times for most users significantly #16052
  • Scrollview pushes button below beyond the screen on iOS #16051
  • [WinUI] Styles from a `ResourceDictionary` do not work on WinUI #16050
  • [WinUI] No way to change the `TextColor` for the `Switch` control #16047

Closed

  • Page title won't update when switching tabs with top bars inside a TabBar inside a shell on Android. Re-introduced #11549
    Backlog
  • [Android] Button Corner Radius is broken with high BorderWidth values #12056
    Backlog
  • Building AdHoc iOS in Release does not ask for permissions on device #16034

PullRequests

Created

  • [Bug] Fixes content sizing issue found on ios for the ScrollView #16048
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Make Add/Remove Logical public #16046

Updated

  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [android] fix memory leak in Window #16045
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Filtering bug with SQLite #31210
  • The given key 'EmptyProjectionMember' was not present in the dictionary #31209
  • Interception for model building #31206
    Backlog

Closed

  • ValidateJsonEntities: System.InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains no elements #31175
  • Add `Exists` and `ExistsAsync` like `Find` and `FindAsync` #31203
  • EFCore with User Type and HasConversion #31172
  • Primary key using `KeyAttribute` isn't being recognized #31120
  • Querying nested json boolean throws an exception #31071

PullRequests

Created

  • Perform alias uniquification in ExecuteUpdate setters #31208
    Servicing-consider

Updated

  • stackalloc for BytesToDecimal #31190
    community-contribution
  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755
    waiting-for-response
